titles.title: MP1091 Lord you are so precious

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, you are so precious to me,
Lord, you are so precious to me
And I love you, yes, I love you
Because you first loved me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, you are so gracious to me,
Lord, you are so gracious to me
And I love you, yes, I love you
Because you first loved me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, you a father to me,
Lord, you a father to me
And I love you, yes, I love you
Because you first loved me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord, you are so faithful to me,
Lord, you are so faithful to me
And I love you, yes, I love you
Because you first loved me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Lord, you are so loving to me,
Lord, you are so loving to me
And I love you, yes, I love you
Because you first loved me.
